chapters.summary: Emotional control is the number one stoic trait that attracts women and leads to life success. Emotional volatility makes you weak. High value men don't want to deal with emotional, volatile little boys who make excuses and complain about their current situation. They're in the same place last year as they were the year before. Controlling your emotions is the biggest power play in today's dating life. Emotional control copy paste into every area of your life. To build a good body takes extreme discipline, extreme focus, and extreme emotional control. If you want to look more attractive and build a great physique, it takes 3-5 years in the gym.
chapters.headline: High value men don't want to deal with emotional, volatile little boys who make excuses and complain about their current situation.

episode_title: WOMEN LOVE this 1 STOIC Trait in a man (Casey Zander)
